description:
The 1974 novel Carrie launched the career of celebrated author Stephen King. Now, several adaptations and a few decades later, a new interpretation of Carrie is being crafted as a series on Amazon Prime Video. Perhaps most excitingly, however, is that Mike Flanagan will produce the new Carrie series. As shared by Deadline, Flanagan will [...]

The post Mike Flanagan To Produce ‘Carrie’ Series For Amazon appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Mike Flanagan To Produce ‘Carrie’ Series For Amazon

description:
The animated classic Lilo & Stitch is getting a live-action makeover from Disney. The studio has been actively adapting their library of animated feature films as live-action interpretations, though Lilo & Stitch is certainly going to be different given its sci-fi elements. Now fans know when to expect Lilo & Stitch as Disney has confirmed [...]

The post ‘Lilo & Stitch’ Live-Action Movie Receives 2025 Release Date appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Lilo & Stitch’ Live-Action Movie Receives 2025 Release Date

description:
Disney Plus is home to a number of different Marvel films and shows, with many of their different series produced exclusively for the streaming service. Nonetheless, that doesn’t mean all of their shows are consistently renewed, and it’s now been revealed that Disney has canceled a Marvel series after producing two seasons for Disney Plus. [...]

The post Disney Cancels Marvel Series After Two Seasons appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Disney Cancels Marvel Series After Two Seasons
